00058           function decode($command){
00059                     
00060                     $cmd=$this->splitdecoded($command);
00061                     
00062                     // if cmd exists...
00063                     if(isset($this->conf[$cmd[0]])){
00064 
00065                         // get Conf Set
00066                               $set=$this->conf[$cmd[0]];
00067                               
00068                               $ncmd=array();
00069                               $ncmd['class']=$set['class'];
00070                               $ncmd['action']=$set['action'];
00071                               
00072                               // dynamic params, from cmd
00073                               $params=explode(',',$set['params'][0]);
00074                               $x=1;
00075                               $param1=array();
00076                               foreach($params as $param){
00077                                         
00078                                         // when many "{..}"
00079                                         if(substr($param,0,1)=='{'){
00080                                                   //if it's not many ({)not an array...)
00081                                                   if(!is_array($cmd[$x])){
00082                                                             $cmd[$x]=array($cmd[$x]);
00083                                                   }
00084                                                   $par=substr($param,1,-1);
00085                                         
00086                                         // optional "[..]" todo: mark it..?
00087                                         }else if(substr($param,0,1)=='['){
00088                                         // When many..
00089                                                   if(substr($param,1,1)=='{'){
00090                                             //if it's not an array...
00091                                             if(!is_array($cmd[$x])){
00092                                                     $cmd[$x]=array($cmd[$x]);
00093                                             }
00094                                             $par=substr($param,2,-2);
00095                                         // not many   
00096                                         }else{
00097                                             //if it's an array...
00098                                             if(is_array($cmd[$x])){
00099                                                     $cmd[$x]='';
00100                                             }
00101                                             $par=substr($param,1,-1);
00102                                         }
00103                                         // normal, must
00104                                         }else{
00105                                                   $par=$param;
00106                                                   //if it's an array...
00107                                                   //if(is_array($cmd[$x])){
00108                                                   //        $cmd[$x]='';
00109                                                   //}
00110                                         }
00111                                         // save it to params[config_key]=cmdparam1
00112                                         $param1[$par]=$cmd[$x];
00113                                         $x++; // nect config_key
00114                               }
00115                               $ncmd['params'][]=$param1;
00116                               
00117                               // static params...
00118                               $x=0;
00119                               foreach($set['params'] as $param){
00120                                         // first is the dynamic...
00121                                         if($x!=0){
00122                                                   $ncmd['params'][]=$param;
00123                                         }else{
00124                                                   $x=1;
00125                                         }
00126                               }
00127                               return array(null,$ncmd);
00128                     }else{
00129                               return array(zerror::err('fail: command does not exist in the CMD Configs of zimbraCMD.php',$cmd[0]),null);
00130                     }
00131           }
00132 
00143           function splitdecoded($cmd){
00144                     // split decoded... , => yes, #, => no
00145                     // then: [## => #][#, =>,][#: => :]
00146                     preg_match_all('/,((?:[^#,]|#.)*)/',','.$cmd,$splits,PREG_PATTERN_ORDER);
00147                     
00148                     $rep=array(
00149                               array('#,','##','#:'),
00150                               array(',','#',':')
00151                     );
00152                     
00153                     $cmds=array();
00154                     
00155                     // every , seperator
00156                     foreach($splits[1] as $split){
00157                               // split decoded... : => yes, #: => no
00158                               preg_match_all('/:((?:[^#:]|#.)*)/',':'.$split,$splits2,PREG_PATTERN_ORDER);
00159                               
00160                               // everey : separator..
00161                               // if ":" found process values...
00162                               if(count($splits2[1])>1){
00163                                         $cmds2=array();
00164                                         foreach($splits2[1] as $split2){
00165                                                   $cmds2[]=str_replace($rep[0],$rep[1],$split2);
00166                                         }
00167                                         $cmds[]=$cmds2;
00168                               //else add value
00169                               }else{
00170                                         $cmds[]=str_replace($rep[0],$rep[1],$split);
00171                               }
00172                     }
00173                     return $cmds;
00174           }

00182           function getemail($email){
00183                     if(strpos($email,'@')===false){
00184                               $email=$email.'@'.$this->domain;
00185                     }
00186                               
00187                     return $this->cleanmail($email);
00188           }
00189           
00190           function cleanval($value){
00191                     return trim($value);
00192           }
00193           function cleanmail($value){
00194                     $rep=array(array('ä','ö','ü'),array('ae','oe','ue'));
00195                     return str_replace($rep[0],$rep[1],$value);
00196           }
00197           
00198           function checkmail($value){
00199                     $email = preg_match("/[\.a-z0-9_-]+@[a-z0-9-]{2,}\.[a-z]{2,4}$/i",$value);
00200                     return ($email!==false &&$value!='')?true:false;
00201           }
